abstract: NBC will count heavily on its lineup of talent competitions to set up a new fall season packed with 12 new scripted series.
snippet: NBC will count heavily on its lineup of talent competitions to set up a new fall season packed with 12 new scripted series.
lead_paragraph: 2:52 p.m. | Updated NBC, hoping to rebound from almost a decade of conspicuous failure, will count heavily on its lineup of talent competitions to set up a new season packed with 12 new scripted series.

headline.main: Upfronts: NBC Bets on Talent Shows and Scripted Series
